ElementGetElementsByClassName.summary:
The method
getElementsByClassName() returns a live
which contains every descendant element which has the
specified class name or names.

remarks.para:
The method
on the interface works essentially the same way, except it acts
on the entire document, starting at the document root.

ElementGetElementsByClassName.returns:
An providing a live-updating list of every element which
is a member of every class in names.
